name: Joggernauts
description: Jog! Jump! Switch! Coordinate the crazy conga line of alien athletes in this autorunner / puzzle platformer for 1-4 players.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, SP1 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
